name: Laser Tanks (sibeBNils)
description:
Survive for as long as you can while tanks appear from nowhere and are trying to kill you :D

BTW This game is made to be played on an ipad. Therefore it is pretty hard to play this game with a keyboard and mouse but i might make a PC version. So if there are any weird bugs on any other devices then thats probably why. Or its just because im terrible at programming and my code is broken D: Please report any bugs you might find :D
